#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
 
 
int 
main()
{
 
	int t,i,j,m;
 
	static long long int a[2000000];
	static long long int b[2000000];
	double sum;
	
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
 
	while(t--)
	{	sum = 0;
		scanf("%d",&m);
		for(i=0; i<m; i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		}
		for (i=0; i<m; i++)
		{				
			scanf("%lld",&b[i]);
		
		}	
			
		for(i=0; i < m-1 ; i++)
		{
			sum = sum + a[i] * b[i+1] - a[i+1] * b[i]; 
		}
 
		sum = sum + a[m-1]*b[0] - a[0]*b[m-1] ;
	
		if(sum<0)
			sum = -sum;
 
		printf("%.1lf\n",sum/2.0);	
						
	}
	return 0;
}
